page.title: 18HOLT RAILWAY STATION.
page.content: HOLT ONCE HAD A{RAILWAY STATION}WHICH WAS CLOSED IN 1965. THE OLD BUILDINGS ARE NOW USED AS{SMALL FACTORIES.}AN OLD SEED MERCHANT'S IS NOW USED AS A {SHOE FACTORY.}WE FOUND OUT THAT THEY ONLY USE LEATHER. THEY MAKE 900 PAIRS OF SHOES A DAY. THEY START WORK AT 8 AM. MOST OF THE MACHINES LOOK LIKE SEWING MACHINES. THE FACTORY HAS 3 FLOORS. THE TOP FLOOR IS VERY HOT BECAUSE LOTS OF THE MACHINES USE HOT AIR. THE PEOPLE WORKING THERE ARE ALL LADIES. THEY STOP WORK AT 4.30 PM. THEY SEND SHOES ALL ROUND ENGLAND. NEXT TO THE SHOE FACTORY IS{THAXTERS, {MAKERS}OF WOODEN SHEDS, SUMMER HOUSES AND GARAGES. THEY GET THEIR WOOD FROM RUSSIA. 10 PEOPLE WORK THERE. THEY MAKE UP TO{20 BUILDINGS}A DAY. THEY SEND THINGS THEY MAKE ALL OVER NORFOLK.
